channel.title: Dragon-History IP Problem
channel.description:
[code]setserver("honorscape.no-ip.biz", "43594");[/code] [code]setserver("honorscape.no-ip.biz", "43594");[/code]
I changed the ip's in Client.
[code]"honorscape.no-ip.biz", "honorscape.no-ip.biz", "honorscape.no-ip.biz"[/code]
And I also changed the ip's in EGUI.
When someone else tries to log into my server, it doesn't let them join. As I log in, it says Connecting to 127.0.0.1, 43594. Or something like that. But I do remember it connecting to the default IP instead of my no-ip. Please help. What am I supposed to do?

item.title: Dragon-History IP Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tainted_2283 Tainted_2283
item.description:

[code]setserver("honorscape.no-ip.biz", "43594");[/code]

I changed the ip's in Client.



[code]"honorscape.no-ip.biz", "honorscape.no-ip.biz", "honorscape.no-ip.biz"[/code]

And I also changed the ip's in EGUI.


When someone else tries to log into my server, it doesn't let them join. As I log in, it says Connecting to 127.0.0.1, 43594. Or something like that. But I do remember it connecting to the default IP instead of my no-ip. Please help. What am I supposed to do?

And I also changed the ip’s in EGUI.

When someone else tries to log into my server, it doesn’t let them join. As I log in, it says Connecting to 127.0.0.1, 43594. Or something like that. But I do remember it connecting to the default IP instead of my no-ip. Please help. What am I supposed to do?
